title: 【翻译】7月13日3.11.5.0更新信息
author: siska
txt_content:
本帖最后由 siska 于 2015-7-13 21:22 编辑 
人工翻译
3.11.5.0
siska翻译允许任何人转载，但要注明作者及来源
翻译：
增添：--给衣服增添资料说明，详情请戳：http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=470771503--在退出菜单上增添一个trello选项，可以在里面看到作者的计划安排，详情请戳：http://trello.com/b/M2jI6d2e/unturned-roadmap--增加了爬地僵尸跑步时、被击中、眩晕等动画效果
改进:--优化了网络连接
调整:--调整了密码/workshop筛选器--游戏等级现在需要解锁才能玩
修复：--修复了加载衣服失败的BUG--修复了僵尸动画的BUG--修复了因车辆、僵尸设置错误导致崩溃的BUG--修复了单人模式中爬地僵尸的BUG--修复了制造菜单显示的BUG--修复了桦木显示的BUG--修复了暂停菜单的BUG
作者寄语：我的Trello已经重新写过了，上面写了我的计划安排。这样我就不会忘记要做的事情了（作者该打{:10_533:}）

原文：Additions: 
Added documentation on clothing items: Workshop: Items Unturned 的一篇指南作者：Nelson SextonThis guide explains how to create items for Unturned.Added link to the Unturned Roadmap from the pause menu: 
http://trello.com/b/M2jI6d2e/unturned-roadmapAdded more sprinter/crawler attack/startle/stun animations.
       Improvements: 
Improved web request implementation.

Tweaks: 
Tweaked password/workshop filters to not block others when enabled.Tweaked levels to be unlockable.

Fixes: 
Fixed crash when loading clothing.Fixed zombie animation index issue.Fixed crash with misconfigured vehicles/zombies.Fixed crawler damage in singleplayer.Fixed primary/secondary getting included in crafting.Fixed birch rampart color at from far away.Fixed pausing tooltip issue.

Note: The Trello page has been re-organized to offer a better idea of what's being worked on and how to get involved. If something seems to be missing be sure let me know!
